ComicInfo.Title: Cat Scratch Fever! [Episode 2]; The Night of the Cat [Episode 1]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cat Scratch Fever! [Episode 2]: Carol tries to figure out how to control her new catlike powers, and breaks into the Grey Institute for an unknown reason, where she encounters a strange creature.
The Night of the Cat [Episode 1]: Student Carol Conor is attacked by a crazed cat and then bombarded by electrical energy in Dr. Baker's lab. Later, she finds that she has gained cat-like powers when she fights off a gang of thugs pursuing her roommate Jeannie.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 14:39:12. [CVDB121039] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 00:17:28. [Issue ID 262825]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bane Kerac,Branislav Kerac (H.M. Baker Bane),Bane Kerac
ComicInfo.Inker: Bane Kerac,Branislav Kerac (H.M. Baker Bane),Bane Kerac
ComicInfo.Characters: Clive Carson,the Werewolf (cameo),Professor Bruce Baker,Jeannie Jones,Carol Conor
